title:
Generalized integration operators on Analytic Tent spaces
  $AT_p^\infty(\alpha)$
authors: Rong Yang, Songxiao Li and Lian Hu
abstract:
In this paper, we investigate the boundedness and compactness of generalized
integration operators $T_g^{n,k}$ and $S_g^{n,0}$ from analytic tent spaces
$AT_p^\infty(\alpha)$ to $AT_q^\infty(\beta)$ when
$0<p,q<\infty,\alpha,\beta>-2$.
